title: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view
description:
Description: Any item in the library outline view cannot be selected on the first attempt.

Observed Behavior:
- When attempting to select an item in the library outline view, the focus jumps to the library file node instead of selecting the intended item.

Expected Behavior:
- The item in the library outline view should be selected on the first attempt, without the focus jumping to the library file node.

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item in the outline view for the first time.
